all-required-course-list: SELECT course_id FROM catalogues WHERE course_type = 'Required Course' AND program_name = 'CSC';
class-level-units: SELECT class_level_units FROM class_level_units WHERE class_level = "[class-level]";
division-level-units: SELECT num_units_lower, num_units_upper FROM division_levels WHERE division_level = "[division-level]";
elective-type-course-names: SELECT course_id FROM catalogues WHERE course_type = "[elective-type]" AND program_name = 'CSC';
flowchart-link: SELECT flowchart_link FROM flowcharts WHERE major = "[major]" AND year_range = "[year-range]";
ge-area-subject: SELECT ge_subject FROM ge_subjects WHERE ge_letter = "[ge-area]";
major-course-names-of-units: SELECT course_name FROM course WHERE course_units = "[num-units]";
major-courses: SELECT course_id FROM catalogues WHERE program_name = "[major]";
major-learning-outcomes-list: SELECT major_learning_outcomes FROM major_learning_outcomes WHERE major = "[major]";
major-peos: SELECT major_peos FROM major_peos WHERE major = "[major]";
minor-advisors: SELECT minor_advisors FROM contact_minor_advisors WHERE minor = "[minor]";
number-season-courses: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(course_number)) FROM offered_in WHERE quarter_id = "[season]";
overlapping-courses-list: SELECT course_name from course_types WHERE support_type = 'MAJOR COURSES';
required-minor-courses: SELECT course_id FROM catalogues WHERE program_name = "[minor]" AND course_type = 'Required Course';
season-course-names:
SELECT course_name
FROM course
WHERE course_number IN (SELECT course_number FROM offered_in WHERE quarter_id = "[season]")
AND course_area IN (SELECT course_area FROM offered_in WHERE quarter_id = "[season]");
class-level-name-units: SELECT class_level FROM class_levels WHERE [num-units] > num_units_lower AND [num-units] < num_units_upper;
division-level-name-units: SELECT division_level FROM division_levels WHERE [num-units] > num_units_lower AND [num-units] < num_units_upper;
major-courses-elective:
SELECT course_id 
FROM catalogues 
where course_type = "[elective-type]"
and program_name = "[major]";
minor-courses-elective:
SELECT course_id 
FROM catalogues 
where course_type = "[elective-type]"
and program_name = "[minor]";
